TEXT: Witch
Enemies attacked by this card receives temporary #ySlow.
Archer
This card #bignores enemy powers that activate when they are #yattacked, like Thorns.
Princess
Gain #b2 #yMax #yHP when you add a #yPrincess card to your Deck.
Undead
This class activates #badditional effects when #yexhausted.
Black Rarity
This type of character have #ybranching paths when #yupgrading. Only Rare cards may have this property.
Eastern Country
This card applies for other effects listing #yEastern #yCountry cards.
Hero
This card can be upgraded any number of times. NL Only obtainable by the #yHero #yCrystal relic and #yTower #yof #yHeroes event.
White Empire
This card has synergies with effects listing Imperial cards, only in the card pool of #yThe #yEmperor.
Curse User
When played, add the #yCurse this card previews to your Master Deck if you don't have it.
Demon
If this card is in Exhaust Pile at the start of your turn: add this to your hand with -1 of its #yOriginal cost for that turn.
Aerial
When played, shuffle #b1 #yAir #ySignal to your Draw Pile.
Necromancer
Increase damage by #b1 for each #yUndead #yExhausted. When this deals unblocked damage, add #b1 #ySkeleton #yUnit to your hand.
